mapper.select: SELECT video_number, chapter_number, video_title, video_id, video_duration, video_order_number, video_create_time FROM VIDEO WHERE chapter_number = #{chapterNumber} ORDER BY video_order_number ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VIDEO (video_number, chapter_number, video_title, video_id, video_duration, video_order_number, video_create_time) VALUES (VIDEO_NUMBER_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{chapterNumber}, #{videoTitle}, #{videoId}, #{videoDuration}, (SELECT COALESCE(MAX(video_order_number), 0) + 1 FROM VIDEO WHERE chapter_number = #{chapterNumber}), SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT v.video_number, v.chapter_number, ch.class_number, cl.title AS classTitle, ch.chapter_name AS chapterTitle, v.video_title, v.video_id, v.video_duration, v.video_order_number, v.video_create_time FROM VIDEO v JOIN CHAPTER ch ON v.chapter_number = ch.chapter_number JOIN CLASS cl ON ch.class_number = cl.class_number WHERE v.video_number = #{videoNumber}

SELECT v.video_number FROM VIDEO v JOIN CHAPTER ch ON v.chapter_number = ch.chapter_number WHERE ch.class_number = #{classNumber} AND (ch.chapter_number < #{chapterNumber} OR (ch.chapter_number = #{chapterNumber} AND v.video_order_number < #{videoOrderNumber})) ORDER BY ch.chapter_number DESC, v.video_order_number DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY

SELECT v.video_number FROM VIDEO v JOIN CHAPTER ch ON v.chapter_number = ch.chapter_number WHERE ch.class_number = #{classNumber} AND (ch.chapter_number > #{chapterNumber} OR (ch.chapter_number = #{chapterNumber} AND v.video_order_number > #{videoOrderNumber})) ORDER BY ch.chapter_number ASC, v.video_order_number ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
